version.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VERSION_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VERSION_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // version.hpp:
00011

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/mpl/integral_c_tag.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/type_traits/is_base_and_derived.hpp>
00026 //#include <boost/serialization/traits.hpp>
00027 
00028 namespace boost { 
00029 namespace serialization {
00030 
00031 struct basic_traits;
00032 
00033 // default version number is 0. Override with higher version
00034 // when class definition changes.
00035 template<class T>
00036 struct version
00037 {
00038     template<class U>
00039     struct traits_class_version {
00040         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME U::version type;
00041     };
00042 
00043     typedef mpl::integral_c_tag tag;
00044     // note: at least one compiler complained w/o the full qualification
00045     // on basic traits below
00046     typedef
00047         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<
00048             is_base_and_derived<boost::serialization::basic_traits,T>,
00049             traits_class_version<T>,
00050             mpl::int_<0>
00051         >::type type;
00052     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(unsigned int, value = version::type::value);
00053 };
00054 
00055 } // namespace serialization
00056 } // namespace boost
00057 
00058 // specify the current version number for the class
00059 #define BOOST_CLASS_VERSION(T, N)                                      \
00060 namespace boost {                                                      \
00061 namespace serialization {                                              \
00062 template<>                                                             \
00063 struct version<T >                                                     \
00064 {                                                                      \
00065     typedef mpl::int_<N> type;                                         \
00066     typedef mpl::integral_c_tag tag;                                   \
00067     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(unsigned int, value = version::type::value); \
00068     /* require that class info saved when versioning is used */        \
00069     /*                                                                 \
00070     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((                                              \
00071         mpl::or_<                                                      \
00072             mpl::equal_to<                                             \
00073                 mpl::int_<0>,                                          \
00074                 mpl::int_<N>                                           \
00075             >,                                                         \
00076             mpl::equal_to<                                             \
00077                 implementation_level<T>,                               \
00078                 mpl::int_<object_class_info>                           \
00079             >                                                          \
00080         >::value                                                       \
00081     ));                                                                \
00082     */                                                                 \
00083 };                                                                     \
00084 }                                                                      \
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VERSION_HPP
